content.html: I’m not sure who needs to hear it, but “offering someone more money or a better environment to work there” is called “recruiting.” GTFO with this “poaching” narrative. You employ people, you don’t own them.
content.value:
I’m not sure who needs to hear it, but “offering someone more money or a better environment to work there” is called “recruiting.” 

GTFO with this “poaching” narrative. You employ people, you don’t own them.
